APP_DESCRIPTION: is a flexible tool that helps users keep track of important birthdays, including those of their loved ones. It features real-time age display in Hijri and Georgian calendars.

landingPage.title: Embrace the Journey of Life with Age Tracker!
landingPage.subtitle: Seize every moment & never forget a birthday! Displays age in real-time, Hijri & Gregorian. Monitor age in in many formats. Rejoice, remember, and make every moment meaningful!

pleaseVerifyEmail: Please verify your email address. We have sent you an email with a link to verify your account.
Name: Name
clickHereToAddNewBirthday: Click here to add new birthday
birthdateMustBeInThePast: Birthdate must be in the past
imageSizeMustBeLessThan2MB: Image size must be less than or equal to 2MB
dropAnImageHereOrClickToChooseOne: Drop an image here or click to choose one
